indexcontentinfindforcecommand.label: Index in Find (ignore conventions)
indexcontentinfindforcecommand.tooltip: Indexes only this content. Ignores conventions.

indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.label: Index in Find (include descendants)
indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Indexes this content and all of its descendants in Find

indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.label: Index in Find (include descendants & ignore conventions)
indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.tooltip: Indexes this content and all of its descendants in Find. Ignores conventions.

removecontentfromfindcommand.label: Remove from Find
removecontentfromfindcommand.tooltip: Removes only this content from the index.

removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.label: Remove from Find (include descendants)
removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Removes this content and all its descendants from the index.

indexcontentinfindinfo.text:
Indexing current content.
You can safely close this dialog and let the work continue quietly in the background.
indexcontentinfindinfo.recursivetext:
Indexing current content and all of it's descendents.
You can safely close this dialog and let the work continue quietly in the background.

Indexing done.

indexcontentinfindforcecommand.label: Indexera i Find (ignorera konventioner)
indexcontentinfindforcecommand.tooltip: Indexerar endast detta innehåll. Ignorerar konventioner.

indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.label: Indexera i Find (inkludera ättlingar)
indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Indexerar detta innehåll och alla ättlingar

indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.label: Indexera i Find (inkludera ättlingar, ignorera konventioner)
indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.tooltip: Indexerar detta innehåll och alla ättlingar. Ignorerar konventioner.

removecontentfromfindcommand.label: Ta bort från Find
removecontentfromfindcommand.tooltip: Tar bort endast detta innehåll från indexet.

removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.label: Ta bort från Find (inkludera ättlingar)
removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Tar bort detta innehåll och alla dess ättlingar från indexet.

indexcontentinfindforcecommand.label: Indeksere i Find (ignorere konvensjoner)
indexcontentinfindforcecommand.tooltip: Indeksere kun dette innhold. Ignorerer konvensjoner.

indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.label: Indeksere i Find (inkludere descendants)
indexcontentinfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Indeksere dette og all avledet innhold

indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.label: Indeksere i Find (inkludere descendants, ignorere konvensjoner)
indexcontentinfinddescendantsforcecomman.tooltip: Indexerar detta innehåll och alla ättlingar. Ignorerer konvensjoner.

removecontentfromfindcommand.label: Fjern fra Find
removecontentfromfindcommand.tooltip: Fjerner bare dette innholdet fra indeksen.

removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.label: Fjern fra Find (inkludere descendants)
removecontentfromfinddescendantscommand.tooltip: Fjerner dette innholdet og alle dets etterkommere fra indeksen.
